Oval (but roundish) leaves have a small mouth-shaped stoma ⎮ Dichasia- two-cell shade or single cell
Large flowers without much anther lobes ⎮ Monoecy ∴∴ Monandry – single flower, single stoma
Insect pollination ⎮≺ Lichen symbiotic of tree and funguses
A fungus would use the latches to get into a tree, not a leaf or flower.
